<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent"> <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <always_available>true</always_available> <category/> <fallback>false</fallback> <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session> <keyword>RunRemediationWorkflow</keyword> <name>Run Remediation Workflow</name> <next_intent/> <order/> <output_speech_format>SSML</output_speech_format> <reprompt_speech_format/> <script><![CDATA[(function(current, content, attributes, ER, IntentUtils){ var msg = '<speak>';
msg += "Workflow 'Get Latest OS Patches' has been executed against the affected CI. When the workflow completes the work notes will be updated with the status of the remediation. Check the Vulnerable Item again soon."
msg += "</speak>";
ER.setOutputSpeech(current.output_speech_format, "", msg); ER.setEnd(current.intent_ends_session); result = ER.response; //Required })(current, content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder(), new IntentUtils());]]></script> <slot_name_1/> <slot_name_2/> <slot_name_3/> <slot_type_1/> <slot_type_2/> <slot_type_3/> <sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-04-16 05:48:46</sys_created_on> <sys_id>58bb12dbdb0ef60015f2de01ce961901</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jc</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-04-16 05:50:55</sys_updated_on> <top_level_intent>false</top_level_intent> </x_snc_amazon_echo_intent> </record_update>
